item.title: 交易日晴朗开局，阴郁收场
item.description: 周三，标普500指数和道琼斯工业平均指数一度攀升至新高，但受美国就业数据喜忧参半影响，最终收盘走低。与此同时，债券收益率、原油及金属价格也出现显著下跌。【原文：The S&P 500 and Dow Jones Industrials climbed to new highs on Wednesday but closed the session lower in the wake of patchy U.S. employment data, while bond yields, oil, and metals prices also posted notable declines.】

item.title: 独家：消息人士称雪佛龙正与美国政府商谈扩大委内瑞拉油田开采许可
item.description: 四位知情人士周三透露，石油生产商雪佛龙正与美国政府商谈扩大在委内瑞拉运营的关键许可证，以便增加向其自身炼油厂的原油出口，并向其他买家销售。【原文：Oil producer Chevron is in talks with the U.S government to expand a key license to operate in Venezuela so it can increase crude exports to its own refineries and sell to other buyers, four sources close to the negotiations said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 随着欺诈调查不断增加，First Brands公司现金告急
item.description: 破产的汽车零部件制造商First Brands可能在本月底前耗尽现金，其律师周三表示，该公司正寻求从贷款方获得额外资金，并推进短期资产出售，以争取更多时间重组业务。该企业长期受欺诈指控困扰。【原文：Bankrupt auto-parts maker First Brands could run out of cash by the end of the month, and it is seeking additional funding from its lenders and pursuing near-term asset sales in order to buy more time to restructure a business that has been plagued by fraud allegations, its attorneys said Wednesday.】

item.title: 印度监管机构发现美银在大宗交易前泄露机密信息，《华尔街日报》报道
item.description: 《华尔街日报》周三援引知情人士报道称，印度市场监管机构发现美国银行不当披露了一笔1.8亿美元股票大宗交易的重大非公开信息，并就此误导了监管机构。【原文：India's markets regulator has found that Bank of America improperly shared material non-public information about a $180 million block trade of stock and misled the authorities about it, the Wall Street Journal reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 摩根大通达成协议接管苹果信用卡业务，《华尔街日报》报道
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周三报道，摩根大通已与高盛达成协议，将接手苹果信用卡项目。该报道援引知情人士消息称。【原文：JPMorgan Chase has reached a deal to take over Apple credit-card program from Goldman Sachs , the Wall Street Journal reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 杰富瑞利润因交易量回升和强劲承销业务而增长
item.description: 杰富瑞周三公布第四季度盈利增长，得益于交易业务反弹和承销业务强劲，这为投资者提供了华尔街投行业务强劲的早期信号。【原文：Jefferies reported higher fourth-quarter profit on Wednesday, boosted by a rebound in dealmaking and strong underwriting, giving investors an early signal about the strength of Wall Street's investment-banking business.】

item.title: 特朗普威胁削减雷神公司政府合同，因其实施股票回购计划
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普周三批评国防承包商雷神公司对美军需求反应迟缓，并威胁称若该公司不限制股票回购，将削减其政府合同。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump criticized defense contractor Raytheon on Wednesday for what he called the company's slow response to the demands of the U.S. military and threatened to cut its government contracts if the firm did not restrict stock buybacks.】

item.title: 埃克森美孚第四季度上游利润下滑
item.description: 美国石油巨头埃克森美孚周三表示，原油价格下跌可能使其第四季度上游业务盈利减少约8亿至12亿美元。【原文：U.S. oil major Exxon Mobil said on Wednesday that lower crude oil prices could cut its fourth-quarter upstream earnings by about $800 million to $1.2 billion.】

item.title: 康卡斯特电视业务剥离为派拉蒙在收购华纳兄弟的战役中提供了更多筹码
item.description: 派拉蒙天空舞影业在争取华纳兄弟探索公司股东支持的行动中获得了新助力——市场对康卡斯特剥离业务的反应，使其更有底气向股东证明：以1084亿美元收购这家历史悠久的好莱坞制片厂、HBO及探索频道的报价更为优越。【原文：Paramount Skydance gained fresh ammunition in its campaign to convince Warner Bros Discovery shareholders that its $108.4 billion bid for the storied Hollywood studio, HBO, and Discovery Channel is the better offer: the market's response to Comcast's spin-off.】

item.title: 彭博社报道，德国汉高公司对Olaplex提出收购意向
item.description: 据彭博社周三报道，知情人士透露，德国消费品制造商汉高已向Olaplex控股公司提出收购要约。【原文：Olaplex Holdings has drawn a takeover offer from Germany's consumer goods maker Henkel , Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: OpenAI推出ChatGPT Health，实现医疗记录与健康应用的互联互通
item.description: OpenAI于周三推出ChatGPT健康标签页，该功能可解答健康相关问题，并允许用户上传医疗记录，同时支持连接Apple Health和MyFitnessPal等健康应用。【原文：OpenAI on Wednesday launched a ChatGPT Health tab that answers health-related questions and lets users upload medical records and connect wellness apps such as Apple Health and MyFitnessPal.】

item.title: KeyCorp旗下子公司将支付777万美元以解决美国欺诈指控
item.description: 新泽西州联邦检察官办公室周三表示，KeyCorp旗下某部门将支付777万美元，以解决其涉嫌违反《联邦虚假索赔法》的指控——该部门曾提交薪资保护计划下的欺诈性贷款申请以获取债务豁免。【原文：A unit of KeyCorp will pay $7.77 million to resolve allegations it violated the federal False Claims Act by submitting fraudulent loans from the Paycheck Protection program for forgiveness, the U.S. Attorney's office in New Jersey said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，艾伯维正洽谈收购生物技术公司Revolution Medicines
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周三报道，知情人士透露，艾伯维正就收购抗癌药物开发商Revolution Medicines进行深入谈判。【原文：AbbVie is in advanced talks to buy cancer-drug developer Revolution Medicines , the Wall Street Journal reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 谷歌与人工智能公司就佛罗里达州母亲因儿子自杀提起的诉讼达成和解
item.description: 据周三法庭文件显示，谷歌母公司Alphabet旗下谷歌公司与人工智能初创企业Character.AI已就一起诉讼达成和解。佛罗里达州一名女子指控Character聊天机器人导致其14岁儿子自杀。【原文：Alphabet's Google and artificial-intelligence startup Character.AI have agreed to settle a lawsuit from a Florida woman who alleged a Character chatbot led to the suicide of her 14-year-old son, according to a Wednesday court filing.】

item.title: 独家：Arm成立"物理AI"部门，加速进军机器人市场
item.description: 芯片技术公司Arm Holdings已重组公司架构，并成立物理人工智能部门以扩大其在机器人市场的业务版图。公司高管在国际消费电子展上向路透社透露了这一消息。【原文：Chip technology company Arm Holdings has reorganized the company and formed a Physical AI unit to expand its presence in the robotics market, company executives told Reuters at CES.】

item.title: 特朗普表示，在国防企业解决装备生产问题之前，他将禁止这些企业发放股息和回购股票。
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普周三表示，在国防企业解决军事装备生产问题之前，他将禁止这些企业发放股息或回购股票。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said on Wednesday he would not permit dividends or stock buybacks for defense companies until they fix problems with the production of military equipment.】

item.title: 摩根大通任命斯里·科萨拉朱为全球投资银行主席
item.description: 摩根大通周三宣布任命斯里·科萨拉朱为全球投资银行主席，以支持该公司在医疗保健行业的垂直业务发展。【原文：JPMorgan Chase said on Wednesday it has appointed Sri Kosaraju as a global chair of investment banking to support the firm's healthcare industry vertical.】

item.title: 知情人士称，Anthropic计划以3500亿美元估值进行新一轮融资
item.description: 据路透社周三报道，两条消息来源透露，Anthropic正计划进行一轮数十亿美元的融资，这将使这家Claude聊天机器人的制造商估值达到3500亿美元。【原文：Anthropic is planning a multi-billion-dollar fundraise that would value the Claude chatbot maker at $350 billion, two sources told Reuters on Wednesday.】

item.title: 特朗普称美国将禁止华尔街投资者购买独栋住宅
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普周三表示，其政府正着手禁止华尔街投资者购买独栋住宅，以期降低房价，此举可能对私募股权房东构成打击。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump on Wednesday said his administration is moving to ban Wall Street investors from buying single-family homes in a bid to reduce home prices, a potential blow for private-equity landlords.】

item.title: 美国能源部称，委内瑞拉石油销售所得资金将存入美国控制的银行账户
item.description: 美国能源部周三发表声明称，美国已开始销售委内瑞拉石油，其销售所得款项将首先存入美国在全球知名银行控制的账户中。【原文：The U.S. has begun marketing Venezuelan oil and all proceeds from its sale will initially settle in U.S.-controlled accounts at globally recognized banks, the Department of Energy said in a statement released on Wednesday.】

item.title: 票务巨头Ticketmaster寻求终结美国联邦贸易委员会的票务转售诉讼案
item.description: 票务巨头Ticketmaster正敦促洛杉矶联邦法官驳回美国联邦贸易委员会的指控。该机构被控与黄牛合作哄抬票价，但Ticketmaster辩称，其被指控违反的法律仅适用于票务转售商，而非票务平台本身。【原文：Ticketmaster is urging a federal judge in Los Angeles to throw out the U.S. Federal Trade Commission's case accusing it of working with resellers to gouge fans, saying the law it is accused of violating applies only to resellers, not ticketing platforms.】

item.title: MSCI将于2026年初在纽约证券交易所推出基准指数期权
item.description: 纽约证券交易所周三表示，其母公司旗下几家交易所将于今年年初承接美国MSCI基准指数期权上市业务，具体安排尚待监管机构批准。【原文：The NYSE said on Wednesday a couple of exchanges under its parent company would host U.S. options listings for several benchmark MSCI indexes early this year, subject to regulatory approval.】

item.title: 美乌基金推出潜在投资项目门户网站
item.description: 美国国际开发金融公司（DFC）周三开通了在线门户网站，供申请人向新设立的美国-乌克兰重建基金提交项目，并表示预计将在未来数月内宣布首批投资项目。【原文：The U.S. International Development Finance Corporation (DFC) on Wednesday launched an online portal for applicants to submit projects to a new U.S.-Ukraine reconstruction fund, saying it expected to announce first investments in coming months.】

item.title: 道琼斯与Polymarket达成协议，将在旗下媒体平台添加预测数据
item.description: 新闻集团旗下的道琼斯公司周三宣布，已与Polymarket达成独家协议，将为其旗下媒体平台——包括《华尔街日报》、《巴伦周刊》和MarketWatch——提供实时预测市场数据。【原文：News Corp's Dow Jones said on Wednesday it had signed an exclusive deal with Polymarket to bring real-time prediction market data to its outlets including The Wall Street Journal, Barron's and MarketWatch.】

item.title: 中国东风汽车正与土耳其商谈乘用车生产事宜，当地经销商透露
item.description: 东风汽车公司正在与一位投资者商谈在土耳其生产乘用车的事宜，该公司土耳其经销商表示。【原文：China's Dongfeng Motor is in talks with an investor about producing passenger cars in Turkey, the company's Turkish distributor said.】

item.title: 富国银行认为美国股市涨势将扩大，因投资者正从巨型股转向其他板块
item.description: 富国银行策略师表示，得益于家庭退税和企业盈利增长强劲，2026年上半年美国股市可能实现超越其常规巨型股领头羊的反弹。【原文：U.S. equities could rally beyond their usual mega-cap leaders in the first half of 2026, helped by tax refunds for households and stronger earnings growth among companies, Wells Fargo strategists said.】

item.title: 巴西审计法院院长称只有最高法院才能推翻 Banco Master 的决定
item.description: 巴西联邦审计法院院长维塔-多-雷戈（Vital do Rego）法官周三表示，该法院无权推翻央行清算贷款机构 Banco Master 的决定，并需要更多时间来评估清算是否合理。【原文：Brazil's federal audit court does not have authority to reverse a central bank decision to liquidate lender Banco Master and needs more time to assess whether the liquidation is justified, the court's head Judge Vital do Rego said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 英国数据监督机构就 Grok 人工智能图像与马斯克的 X 公司取得联系
item.description: 英国数据监管机构信息专员办公室（Information Commissioner's Office）周三表示，鉴于人们对使用 X 的内置人工智能机器人 Grok 制作图像的担忧，该机构已要求埃隆-马斯克的 X 公司澄清其如何遵守数据保护法。【原文：Britain's data regulator, the Information Commissioner's Office, said on Wednesday it had asked Elon Musk's X to clarify how it was complying with data protection laws in light of concerns about the use of X's built-in AI bot Grok to produce images.】

item.title: 高盛称，对冲基金将在 2025 年借助股市上涨带来两位数收益
item.description: 高盛（Goldman Sachs）的一份报告显示，2025 年对冲基金取得了强劲的收益，因为大盘股指在年末接近创纪录的高点，而且市场勇敢地面对了美国贸易政策不确定性引发的波动。【原文：Hedge funds notched robust gains in 2025, as broader stock indexes ended the year near record highs and markets braved volatility triggered by uncertainty around U.S. trade policy, according to a Goldman Sachs report.】

item.title: 信息》报道：中国要求科技公司停止订购英伟达 H200 芯片
item.description: 据《信息时报》周三援引知情人士的话报道，中国政府已要求一些中国科技公司本周停止订购英伟达的H200芯片，并可能强制要求购买国产人工智能芯片。【原文：Beijing has asked some Chinese tech companies to halt orders for Nvidia's H200 chips this week and may mandate domestic AI chip purchases, the Information reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】
